Ad Group ID.description: The ID of the ad group.

Day.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Either Day, Week or Month must be queried.

Group or Site.description: The section group value. Site is no longer available.

Group.description: The native supply group, i.e., GROUP_1A, GROUP_1B, GROUP_2A, GROUP_2B, GROUP_3A, GROUP_3B.

Bid Modifier.description: The bid modifier used for the ad.

Average Bid.description: The average bid for the ad.

Modified Bid.description: The average bid multiplied by the bid modifier.

Post Click Conversions.description: The total number of post click conversions.

Post Impression Conversions.description: The total number of post view conversions.

Conversions.description: The total number of conversions, includes both post click and post view conversions. For app install campaigns the default conversion windows are 7 days post-click and 1 day post view. For website conversions, the default windows are 30 days post-click and 2 days post-view.

Fact Conversion Counting.description: The way your conversions were counted for the campaign during the report time range (ALL_PER_INTERACTION, ONE_PER_INTERACTION).
